decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with spells using card draw and selection spells like Opt, Consider, and Sleight of Hand, in order to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard multiple times in a single turn. The deck includes a few counterspells and removal spells for protection, but the primary win condition is to overwhelm the opponent with repeated attacks from Arclight Phoenix. Highway Robbery can also be used to steal important cards from the opponent's deck.

The deck focuses on playing fast and aggressive creatures and spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It includes a mix of creatures with haste and spell cards that deal direct damage. The deck also includes cards that provide protection and buffs to its creatures. The companion card, Jegantha, the Wellspring, adds an additional element to the deck and can provide additional mana flexibility. The lands in the deck are focused on producing the necessary colors of mana to cast the spells and creatures efficiently.

This deck focuses on utilizing a variety of legendary creatures and planeswalkers to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. The deck includes cards that provide mana acceleration and card selection to ensure a consistent flow of threats onto the battlefield. The mix of creatures allows for a versatile aggro strategy, while also providing some resilience with protective and disruptive elements. The inclusion of lands that support the legendary theme further enhances the deck's synergy and overall strength in combat.

The main focus of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly and efficiently deal damage to the opponent using low-cost spells and creatures with prowess abilities. By continuously cast spells and attacking with creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize. The deck also includes a mix of burn spells and counterspells to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect its own creatures. The lands are optimized for mana efficiency and consistency in casting spells.
